title.japanese: 땅콩の獅子吼 vs ミーアキャット

puppy_character.name: 땅콩
puppy_character.image_prompt: cute fluffy orange Pomeranian puppy, small round face, bright dark eyes, fluffy orange-cream fur, tiny black nose, pointed ears, adorable expression

script_segments.speaker: puppy
script_segments.narration: 아빠! 땅콩이 사자후 보여줄까? 어흥! 내가 제일 쎄다!

script_segments.speaker: owner

script_segments.speaker: puppy
script_segments.narration: 에헤헤... 이번엔 미어캣! 땅콩이 미어캣도 잘해! 읭?
script_segments.puppy_pose: standing on hind legs like meerkat, looking around
script_segments.background: cozy living room with soft lighting

script_segments.speaker: owner
script_segments.puppy_pose: standing on hind legs, looking left and right curiously
script_segments.background: cozy living room with soft lighting

script_segments.speaker: puppy
script_segments.narration: 읭? 읭? 꺄악! 털 젖었어! 미어캣 아니고 물에 빠진 쥐다!
script_segments.puppy_pose: wet fur, shocked wide eyes, water droplets on face

script_segments.speaker: owner
script_segments.narration: 아이고, 우리 땅콩이 쥐돌이 됐네! 괜찮아, 아빠가 닦아줄게!
script_segments.puppy_pose: wrapped in fluffy white towel, only face visible, cute look
